rounds.category: ARE YOU SMARTER THAN A 1905 5th GRADER?

clues.text:
Current events:
Bloody Sunday just broke out in this country, outside the Winter Palace, no less!

Geography:
It's the largest state in the union by area

Social studies:
It first appeared in "The Youth's Companion" only 13 years ago in 1892 & we say it in class every day

World Powers:
This empire stretches from North Africa to southeastern Europe & well into the Middle East

Reading:
This O. Henry story about a poor couple at Christmastime makes a good read in the New York Sunday World
Another word for prison
In the 1960s feminists defined this as a system designed to keep women down, hence the need to smash it
It's the pseudoscience of examining the shape of the head to determine intelligence & character
Another word for treachery
This fancy word meaning invested with full authority is included in the title "ambassador extraordinary &..."
One half minus one sixth equals this amount when reduced to its simplest fraction
If the legs of a right triangle are 6 inches & 8 inches, this is the length of the hypotenuse
There are this many spots total on 2 standard dice
It's the product of a baker's dozen & the classic number of hills of Rome
A pound & a half of coffee costs $480, so it's this much per ounce
They're the 3 flavors in Neapolitan ice cream
Lobster & filet mignon are often paired as this rhyming combo
An iconic Southern pairing is shrimp & this side dish made from ground corn & boiled
These 2 ingredients are popularly paired on a bagel in a deli & in a Philadelphia roll at a sushi bar
In L.A., foodies & locals like to dine at "Roscoe's House of" these paired foods
From a radio he boasted on "Industry Baby" of having "couple Grammys on him, couple plaques"
Mom sent me a clip of this ABC medical drama that premiered in 2005 but is maintaining its practice in the 2021-22 TV season
My niece wanted to watch (again) her favorite movie about this superfast animated critter who got a dental makeover
Season 12 of this show was on at the gym & I watched Gigi Goode sashay on the runway
It was late but my film major roommate had to watch this Hitchcock "you kill my dad, I kill your wife" classic & I got sucked in
Ordinal term for Joe, Jill, Ashley & Hunter, though they don't all live in the White House
After Selection Sunday in 2022, the first four games of this will take place in Dayton
This crusty phrase means a meal is about to be shared
A songbird begins this phrase, an early warning of peril
This literary character was also known as the "Galloping Hessian of the Hollow"
The title ghost of this Toni Morrison novel gets her name from a headstone that's missing the word "Dearly"
Critics have long debated the "reality" of the ghosts that visit 2 children in this classic Henry James novella
A dead girl observes her family, friends & killer in this 2002 bestseller by Alice Sebold, later a movie
In a classic tale by M.R. James, a man is cursed when he's given a slip of paper written with these Old Nordic letters
The Winchester Mystery House in California was one of her inspirations for "The Haunting of Hill House"
In 2021 Yo-Yo Ma & Emanuel Ax released an album of Beethoven's complete works for piano & this instrument
It's an arrangement performed in a slow & easy manner, like Samuel Barber's one "for Strings"
Composed in the 1700s, "The Four Seasons" concertos by this composer are meant to convey different times of the year
The ballet "The Rite of Spring" features music by this composer & at its premiere in 1913 had choreography by Nijinsky
Born in 1833, he's known for an 1860s "Lullaby"
Playbill says this period lasts 10 to 15 minutes
The American College of Obstetrics & Gynecology applies this 2-word phrase starting at exactly 39 weeks of pregnancy
Often a dubious purchase, it gives you peace of mind for a longer time & is also called a service contract
Coal was not a dying industry in this part of the Carboniferous Period that succeeded the Mississippian 323 mil. years ago
One reason they eat so late in Spain is they're on Central European time, an hour ahead of the more logical GMT, short for this
"Super Size Me"; about a man who eats only at this place
This festival comes before "The Greatest Party That Never Happened" in a 2019 documentary
"They Shall Not Grow Old"; Peter Jackson documents this early 20th century event
"Exit Through the Gift Shop"; directed by & about this enigmatic street artist
"Citizenfour"; about this infamous whistleblower, now a resident of Russia
It's about 450 miles away from Greenland, & the magnetic one is on the move, heading toward Russia
The Greater & Lesser Antilles are major divisions of this group of islands
Michigan State University leads a Spartan lifestyle in this city on the Red Cedar River
Aberdeen is one of only 5 cities in this Midwest state to have more than 20,000 people
The Devil's Hole off Edinburgh is an over 750-foot trench in this arm of the Atlantic
Ben Platt reprised the role of the title teen with a broken arm when this Broadway musical became a 2021 film
Trey Parker & Matt Stone of "South Park" won Tonys for their work on this musical about Elder Price & Elder Cunningham
Act I of this long-running musical starts with the song "Think Of Me" & ends with a chandelier crashing
This musical is based on Sholom Aleichem's stories about Tevye the dairyman
"Waitress" has music & lyrics by this woman who had a Top 40 hit with "Brave"

rounds.text: This 2007 bestselling novel takes its title from a line in the poem "Kabul" by the 17th century Persian poet Saib
